DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 12 Pharyngeal Stripping Wave Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of pharyngeal stripping wave in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Pharyngeal Stripping Wave
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's pharyngeal stripping wave during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Pharyngeal Stripping Wave
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's pharyngeal stripping wave during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's pharyngeal stripping wave during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of a pharyngeal stripping wave present but diminished.

Concepts.longName: Pharyngeal Stripping Wave Present but Diminished
Concepts.definition: A finding of a pharyngeal stripping wave present but diminished.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of a pharyngeal stripping wave present and complete.

Concepts.longName: Pharyngeal Stripping Wave Present and Complete
Concepts.definition: A finding of a pharyngeal stripping wave present and complete.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of an absent pharyngeal stripping wave.

Concepts.definition: A finding of an absent pharyngeal stripping wave.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
